name: A Bird in Hand
effect:
Pay (2) to complete this quest.

Reward: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's an ally, put it into your hand.
"The Harpies communicate across the ridge using a series of signal fires. If we extinguish one, Marion is sure to come investigate." - Thisalee Crow

name: Aggressive Infiltration
effect: Your hero deals 3 melee damage to each exhausted opposing hero and ally.
"Get in there and do as much damage as you can. That's what you're good at, right?" - Garrosh Hellscream

name: Alador Stonebrew
effect: Protector
"Times are tough, lad, but I'll always have yer back."

name: Annihilate
effect: Destroy target exhausted ally or exhausted equipment.
"You expend yourself too quickly." - Timmo Shadestep

name: Barman Shanker
effect: This weapon has +2 ATK while your hero is attacking an exhausted hero or ally.

name: Blueleaf Tubers
effect:
Pay (2) to complete this quest.

Reward: Shuffle your graveyard into your deck.
"Those tubers are impossible to find unless you know just where to look. That's why I've trained these snufflenose gophers to find them for me."

name: Elycia of Gilneas
effect: On your turn: (4), Flip Elycia → Target hero or ally has +2 ATK and Stealth this turn.

name: Entrenched
effect:
If you control an ally: Pay (3) to complete this quest.

Reward: Draw a card.
"Diamant says you are to be trusted. Diamant is patient and wise, so I shall allow you to prove yourself." - Kor the Immovable

name: Favor of Mischief
effect:
Attach to target friendly ally.

Ongoing: Attached ally has Assault 2.

When attached ally is destroyed, target opponent discards a card.

name: Flesh Eating Poison
effect:
Attach to target hero or ally that was dealt combat damage by your hero this turn.

Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 5 nature damage to attached character.

name: Gouge
effect: Exhaust target hero or ally. It can't ready during its controller's next ready step.
"Study your intended victim and then exploit his weaknesses for maximum effectiveness." - Caleb Pavish

name: Hira
effect: "The flames dance before my fingertips like puppets dance for their master."

name: Infiltrate
effect: Up to two target heroes and/or allies have Assault 2 and Stealth this turn.
"Stick to the shadows. You'll live a lot longer that way." - Zimzi the Trickster

name: Jeniva Prescott
effect: When this ally enters play, she may heal 4 damage from target hero or ally.
"I may not be able to lift this curse, but that does not mean the Light has abandoned me."

name: Jinie Swizzleshade
effect: Elusive
"Let's see how the raging elementals handle a heavy dose of the shadows."

name: Laenthor Shademoon
effect: "The Highborne have been in hiding for too long. It is time for them to rejoin their brethren."

name: Mystery Goo
effect:
Pay (3) to complete this quest.

Reward: Reveal the top five cards of your deck. Put a revealed ability into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
The greenish substance inside the cauldron appears to be similar to what you found in the flask.

name: Pernicious Poison
effect:
Attach to target hero or ally that your hero dealt combat damage to this turn.

Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 3 nature damage to attached character.
The venom from a serpent is a minor inconvenience compared to what these rogues use.

name: Randipan
effect: When this ally deals combat damage to a defending hero, draw a card.
"The fastest way to an orc's heart is between the third and fourth ribs."

name: Roger Ulric
effect: "I've got your scent now - there's no escape!"

name: Scaramanga
effect: (2), Destroy this ally → Draw a card.
"Ours is the loneliest profession."

name: Scarlet Kris
effect: Its secret is that the blood of its victims keeps the scarlet color bright.

name: Shadow Dance
effect:
Subtlety Talent

Your hero has Assault 2 and Stealth this turn.

Ongoing: When you play a ability, your hero has Assault 2 and Stealth this turn.

name: Silent Crusader
effect: When an opponent's hero is dealt combat damage with this weapon, exhaust all cards he controls.
"Shhh ..." - Rordag the Sly

name: Slay the Feeble
effect: Your hero deals 3 melee damage to target exhausted hero or ally.
If a rogue is present, it's never a fair fight.

name: The Essence of Enmity
effect:
Pay (3) to complete this quest.

Reward: Reveal the top five cards of your deck. Put a revealed ally into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
"The creatures you seek swarm over the Den of Flame to the northwest and the Stonemaul Ruins to the north." - Brogg

name: The Key to Freedom
effect:
Pay (4) to complete this quest.

Reward: Draw a card.
The small brass key looks simple enough.

name: Trickster's Gambit
effect: The next time damage would be dealt to your hero this turn, it's dealt to another target hero or ally instead.
"You must be ready to change your focus at a moment's notice." - Zimzi the Trickster

name: Trixie Boltclunker
effect: Protector
"Just remember to thank the little people once I've saved your life."

name: Wyndarr Shadefist
effect: This ally has Stealth while an opponent controls an ally with cost 4 or less.
"Stand back and watch me work."
